mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID,A.EMS_NO AS EMSNO,A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,A.BOND_INVT_NO AS BONDINVTNO,A.L_NO AS LNO,B.ATTR_NAME AS IEFLAG,C.ATTR_NAME AS DCLTYPECD,A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO, D.ATTR_NAME AS MODFMARKCD,A.RMK AS RMK
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM DCR_CHGOFF_INVT_LT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON B.ATTR_VALUE = A.IE_FLAG AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='IMPEXP_MARKCD' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES C ON C.ATTR_VALUE = A.DCL_TYPECD AND C.DICTIONARY_VALUE='CHGOFF_TYPECD' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES D ON D.ATTR_VALUE = A.MODF_MARKCD AND D.DICTIONARY_VALUE='MODF_MARK' WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE DCR_CHGOFF_INVT_LT SET L_NO = L_NO - 1 WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo} AND L_NO > #{lNo};
